title: -.github_workflows_test.yml
text:
## [[Tags]]
-.github_workflows_test.yml [[--âš™ï¸ AutomatizaciÃ³n]] [[--- Codigo]]

```bash
# .github/workflows/test.yml
name: ğŸ§ª Run Project Tests

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: ğŸ§¾ Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v3

    - name: ğŸ Set up Python 3.12
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: 3.12

    - name: ğŸ“¦ Install dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt

    - name: ğŸ§ª Run tests with pytest
      run: |
        python -m pytest -v

```
